system.description: A vertical column of divine fire roars down from the heavens. You point and a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high column of flame descends. Creatures in the area take 1d6 points of fire damage per caster level (maximum 15d6); half of the damage is fire and half is sacred (good-aligned) or profane (evil-aligned) energy. A successful Reflex save halves the damage.
